name: GoogleCloudAppEngine
description: Deploy and manage App Service and Service Endpoints.
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://github.com/nexsolab/azure-devops-google-cloud-tools#readme) or [see the Cloud App Engine documentation](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/admin-api)
author: Gabriel Anderson

inputs.name: authenticationMethod
inputs.label: Authentication method
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Authorization requires the following Google IAM roles:
`roles/dns.admin`

inputs.name: SCserviceAccount
inputs.label: Google Cloud Service Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Service Account that should be used for the next steps

inputs.name: jsonCredentials
inputs.label: JSON Credentials file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the JSON file with the credentials, see for more information

options.service: Create a service or a version
options.delete-version: Delete a version from a service

inputs.name: gcpRegion
inputs.label: Region
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or select the region where this function should be created.

inputs.name: gcpLabels
inputs.label: Resource labels
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Put JSON or use the editor.
**Keys** must start with a lowercase character and contain only hyphens (\-), underscores (\_), lowercase characters, and numbers.
**Values** must contain only hyphens (\-), underscores (\_), lowercase characters, and numbers.

options.userDisabled: Application has been disabled by the user
options.systemDisabled: Application has been disabled by the system

inputs.name: appCookieExp
inputs.label: Default cookie expiration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Cookie expiration policy for this application. (Default: 1 day)

inputs.name: appGCRDomain
inputs.label: GCR domain
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Google Container Registry domain used for storing managed build docker images for this application.

inputs.name: appAuthDomain
inputs.label: Auth domain
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Google Apps authentication domain that controls which users can access this application.
Defaults to open access for any Google Account.

inputs.name: appOptimizedOS
inputs.label: Use Container-Optimized OS base image for VMs
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, use [Container-Optimized OS](https://cloud.google.com/container-optimized-os/) base image for VMs, rather than a base Debian image.

inputs.name: appIapClientId
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: OAuth2 client ID to use for the authentication flow.

inputs.name: appIapClientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: OAuth2 client secret to use for the authentication flow.

inputs.name: certificateName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user-specified display name of the certificate. This is not guaranteed to be unique.

inputs.name: certificateDeployMode
inputs.label: Deploy mode for DNS and certificates

options.incremental: Incremental - add new ones, ignore existing, don't delete
options.update: Update - add new ones, update existing, but don't delete
options.maintain: Maintain - ignore existing, add or delete

inputs.helpMarkDown: Note: the check will occur comparing display names for certificates, and IDs (domain) for custom DNS

inputs.name: customDns
inputs.label: Domain mapping ID (custom DNS)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative name of the domain serving the application. Example: `example.com.`

inputs.name: customDnsAssociate
inputs.label: Associate this DNS with the certificate above
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSL support for this domain is configured manually by the user. Either the domain has no SSL support or a user-obtained SSL certificate has been explictly mapped to this domain. To omit SSL support leave this unchecked.

inputs.name: fwRange
inputs.label: IP address or range, defined using CIDR notation
inputs.helpMarkDown:
You can use the wildcard character `*` to match all IPs equivalent to `0/0` and `::/0` together.
Examples: `192.168.1.1` or `192.168.0.0/16` or `2001:db8::/32` or `2001:0db8:0000:0042:0000:8a2e:0370:7334`.

Truncation will be silently performed on addresses which are not properly truncated.
For example, `1.2.3.4/24` is accepted as the same address as `1.2.3.0/24`. Similarly, for IPv6, `2001:db8::1/32` is accepted as the same address as `2001:db8::/32`.

inputs.name: fwPriority
inputs.label: Rule priority
inputs.helpMarkDown: A positive integer between [1, Int32.MaxValue-1] that defines the order of rule evaluation. Rules with the lowest priority are evaluated first.

inputs.name: svcVersion
inputs.label: Version ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative name of the version within the service. Example: `v1`. Version names can contain only lowercase letters, numbers, or hyphens. Reserved names: `default`, `latest`, and any name with the prefix `ah-`.

inputs.name: svcScaling
inputs.label: Scaling
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Automatic scaling is based on request rate, response latencies, and other application metrics. **Frontend**

A service with manual scaling runs continuously, allowing you to perform complex initialization and rely on the state of its memory over time. **Backend**

A service with basic scaling will create an instance when the application receives a request. The instance will be turned down when the app becomes idle. Basic scaling is ideal for work that is intermittent or driven by user activity. **Backend**

inputs.name: svcEnvironment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: [See docs for more information](https://cloud.google.com/appengine/docs/the-appengine-environments)

inputs.name: svcAutoInstanceClass
inputs.label: Instance Class
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instance class that is used to run this version

inputs.name: svcManualInstanceClass
inputs.label: Instance Class
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instance class that is used to run this version

inputs.name: svcMainPath
inputs.label: The path or name of the app's main executable

inputs.name: svcNoBuild
inputs.label: Regex to ignore files in build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Files that match this pattern will not be built into this version. Only applicable for Go runtimes.

inputs.name: svcThreadSafe
inputs.label: Is thread safe
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether multiple requests can be dispatched to this version at once.

inputs.name: svcVM
inputs.label: Deploy on a VM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to deploy this version in a container on a virtual machine.

inputs.name: svcStaticExp
inputs.label: Cache default expiration (static files)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Duration that static files should be cached by web proxies and browsers. Only applicable if the corresponding StaticFilesHandler does not specify its own expiration time.

inputs.name: svcVpcConnector
inputs.label: VPC Connector name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full Serverless VPC Access Connector name e.g. `/projects/my-project/locations/us-central1/connectors/c1`.

inputs.name: svcShell
inputs.label: The entrypoint for the application (shell command)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The format should be a shell command that can be fed to `bash -c`.

inputs.name: svcEnvVars
inputs.label: Environment variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Environment variables available to the application.

inputs.name: svcLibraries
inputs.label: Python libraries (name and version)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Edit the list, putting the library name and the version in the value. i.e. `-django latest`

inputs.name: svcBetaSettings
inputs.label: Beta Settings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Metadata settings that are supplied to this version to enable beta runtime features.

inputs.name: networkPorts
inputs.label: Forwarded ports
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of ports, or port pairs, to forward from the virtual machine to the application container. Only applicable in the App Engine flexible environment. (Separated by commas `,`)

inputs.name: networkSubName
inputs.label: Sub-network short name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Google Cloud Platform sub-network where the virtual machines are created. Specify the short name, not the resource path.

inputs.name: resCPU
inputs.label: Number of CPU cores needed
inputs.helpMarkDown: [See machine types](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types)

validation.message: Should be a number between 0.2 and 416

inputs.name: resMemory
inputs.label: Memory (GB) needed
inputs.helpMarkDown: [See machine types](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types)

validation.message: Should be a number between 0.2 and 416

inputs.name: resDisk
inputs.label: Disk size (GB) needed
inputs.helpMarkDown: [See machine types](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/machine-types)

validation.message: Should be a number between 0.2 and 416

inputs.name: waitOperation
inputs.label: Wait for long running operation
inputs.helpMarkDown: If enabled, pipeline will wait until resource be modified, instead of just scheduling an operation.
inputs.visibleRule: operation = create || operation = update || operation = repair

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceMail
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive mail.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceMailBounce
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive email-bound notifications.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceXmppError
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive error stanzas.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceXmppMessage
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive instant messages.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceXmppSubscribe
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive user subscription POSTs.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceXmppPresence
inputs.label: Allows an application to receive a user's chat presence.

inputs.name: svcInboundServiceChannelPresence
inputs.label: Registers an application for notifications when a client connects or disconnects from a channel.

OutputVariables.name: AppName
OutputVariables.description: Full path to the Application resource in the API. Example: `apps/myapp`.

OutputVariables.name: AppCodeBucket
OutputVariables.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket that can be used for storing files associated with this application.

OutputVariables.name: AppDefaultHostname
OutputVariables.description: Hostname used to reach this application, as resolved by App Engine.

OutputVariables.name: AppDefaultBucket
OutputVariables.description: Google Cloud Storage bucket that can be used by this application to store content.
